entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kejimkujik (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kejimkujik Park 3:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
